lines.text: Don't get your hopes up, he's been Leslie-ized.
Oh will you stop, I've been Reagan-ized.
[after unintentionally scaring away a marine sergeant]

[sadly]
All I wanted to ask him is to join me in a cigarette.
No... and we are such gentle people.
Goodbye you wonderful package of animal instinct.
Every time I look at the Hollywoodland sign, I'll remember...
I'll meet you there after the war... and we'll unscrew all the bulbs!

[Announcing to the audience in the canteen]
Folks! The millionth man!
Its Slim!. Johnny, you arranged this.
I swear, its on the level.
